name: Sorcerers Summit
description:
An army of contraptions swarm the skies, and it is up to you, a lone sorcerer to defend the castle wall.

LET NONE PASS!

Move quickly, dash quicker, and bam, boom, blast them out of the sky with your magic.
See how long you can last in this simple and stylish score attack game.

  • Easy to learn controls for young acolytes to ancient sorcerers.
  • Leaderboards to compete against your foes and friends.
  • 2 game modes: Endless and Timed.
  • Endless - Keep playing until a contraption escapes.
  • Timed - 45 seconds of mayhem.




Dash in, have fun!
